mapper.select:
SELECT b.short_name FROM ${prefix}_order_list a INNER JOIN device b ON a.device_id_jp= b.device_id_jp
AND a.order_id= '${orderId}'

SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '') id, DATE_FORMAT(a.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') order_day, COUNT(a.id) sales_count, SUM(a.sale_price) sales_amount, a.goods_code, c.id device_id FROM #{prefix}_order_list a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON b.goods_code = a.goods_code INNER JOIN device c ON c.device_id_jp = a.device_id_jp
AND a.order_time >=#{startOrderTime} AND a.order_time <=#{endOrderTime} AND a.order_status=2
GROUP BY a.goods_code, a.device_id_jp, order_day

SELECT a.goods_name goodsName, a.sale_price salePrice, a.pay_type payType, a.order_id orderId, a.device_id_jp deviceIdJp, a.device_id_supp deviceIdSupp, a.ctn, a.floor, a.order_type orderType, a.path_code pathCode FROM ${prefix}_order_list a
AND a.order_status=${orderStatus}
AND a.order_id='${order}'
FOR UPDATE
